data.name: Property
desc: There are three types of properties:

items.name: Name
desc: specifies the name of the property.
The name is unique within an XPropertySet. Upper and lower case are distinguished.

items.name: Handle
desc: contains an implementation-specific handle for the property.
It may be -1 if the implementation has no handle. You can use this handle to get values from the XFastPropertySet.

items.name: Type
desc: contains an object that identifies the declared type for the property.
If the property has multiple types or the type is not known, but not an any, then void must be returned.

items.name: Attributes
desc: This field may contain zero or more constants of the PropertyAttribute constants group.
